BasicHero.title: Crystal Logistics Services
BasicHero.paragraph: Whether it's full truckloads or groupage, both national and global, we provide you with a wide range of solutions to transport your goods at the best costs.
BasicHero.hasCargoTitle: Do You Have Cargo to Transport?
BasicHero.hasCargoText1: Do you need domestic or international freight transport?
BasicHero.hasCargoText2: Crystal Logistics Services offers you complete services for road transport, oversized transport, and express shipments through the CLS freight exchange.
BasicHero.hasCargoText3: Fill out the form and receive a complete logistics quote in maximum 30 minutes!

Services.title: Choose the right transport solution for you

road.title: International Road Transport
road.text: Complete road freight transport solutions (FCL, LCL, express, oversized, dangerous goods). Own fleet and reliable partnerships.

maritime.title: Maritime Transport
maritime.text: We cover the most important ports. We offer flexible and efficient solutions for containerized (FCL/LCL) or conventional cargo transport.

air.title: Air Transport
air.text: Fast and safe transport of goods, with global coverage. Standard or express transport options, adapted to your urgent needs.

rail.title: Rail Transport
rail.text: An efficient alternative for large volumes, over long distances. Competitive rail freight transport services, including combined transport.

multimodal.title: Multimodal (Combined) Transport
multimodal.text: We optimize costs and delivery time using a combination of routes. The perfect solution for efficiency and sustainability.

faqs.question: What types of transport do you offer?

answer.intro: We offer a wide range of logistics solutions, tailored to our clients' needs:

faqs.question: Are the transports insured?
faqs.answer: Yes, all transports carried out through Crystal Logistics Services benefit from CMR insurance, in accordance with international regulations, to give you complete peace of mind.

faqs.question: How can I request a price quote?
faqs.answer: You can request a quote directly by filling out the form available on the website. We guarantee a prompt response and a personalized offer within a maximum of 30 minutes.
